scripts.client: cd client && yarn  start || npm start
scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "yarn server || npm run server" "yarn client || npm run client"
scripts.build: cd client && yarn build || npm run build
scripts.install-all: yarn || npm install && concurrently "yarn install-client || npm run install-client" "yarn install-functions || npm run install-functions"
scripts.icons: cd client && yarn icons || npm run icons
scripts.storybook: cd client && yarn storybook || npm run storybook
